body: Ending was awesome. Love a loli yandere

Unserious
The only thing I can think of is that they took the shirts over their heads and uncuffed arms leaving it dangling from the cuffed arm. Then they pushed it through the gap in between the handcuff and wrist.

I loosely tied some string to my wrist and tried it. I can confirm it's possible to remove a shirt while one arm is handcuffed.
